Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Leman Russ Tank Punisher
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
An anti-infantry variant of the Leman Russ tank. This design swaps the 120mm Battle Cannon for a Punisher Gatling Cannon, a rapid-fire rotary cannon firing explosive rounds. While it is less effective against enemy armor than the standard model, it can easily shred massed infantry in a storm of explosions. 

Space Marines may be regarded as Angels of Death, but many such angels have met their end under the treads of a tank. Additionally insulting is the fact that gene-seed is exceedingly difficult to extract from the Progenoid Gland of a crushed and mangled corpse. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x1, Passenger x2
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
